verses.name: Matthew 26:42
verses.text: He went away again the second time, and prayed, saying, O my Father, if this cup may not pass away from me, except I drink it, thy will be done.

verses.name: Matthew 26:43
verses.text: And he came and found them asleep again: for their eyes were heavy.

verses.name: Matthew 26:44
verses.text: And he left them, and went away again, and prayed the third time, saying the same words.

verses.name: Matthew 26:45
verses.text: Then cometh he to his disciples, and saith unto them, Sleep on now, and take your rest: behold, the hour is at hand, and the Son of man is betrayed into the hands of sinners.
